scripts.dev: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'services/api/drizzle'; if (!fs.existsSync(path) || fs.readdirSync(path).length === 0) { const { execSync } = require('child_process'); console.log('Drizzle directory not found or empty, running drizzle-kit...'); execSync('bunx drizzle-kit generate && bunx drizzle-kit push', { cwd: 'services/api', stdio: 'inherit' }); }" && concurrently "bun --filter web dev" "bun --filter api dev"
scripts.dev:api: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'services/api/drizzle'; if (!fs.existsSync(path) || fs.readdirSync(path).length === 0) { const { execSync } = require('child_process'); console.log('Drizzle directory not found or empty, running drizzle-kit...'); execSync('bunx drizzle-kit generate && bunx drizzle-kit push', { cwd: 'services/api', stdio: 'inherit' }); }" && bun --filter api dev
